meanings.definition: Make (something) more modern or up to date.
meanings.sent1: I need to update my phone to get the latest features.
meanings.sent2: She updates her wardrobe every season to stay fashionable.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer refuse to update? It was feeling outdated!
meanings.sent4: Her new haircut really updated her look, like a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The software update was like a breath of fresh air, making everything run smoother.

meanings.definition: A revised or new version of something.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded the latest update for the app on my phone.
meanings.sent2: The company released an update to fix the bugs in the system.
meanings.sent3: The update arrived just in time for the big presentation, like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: The new update of the game added exciting levels, like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent5: The software update was a game-changer, making work more efficient.
